sentences.english: At stroke of midnight God shall win.
sentences.chinese: 现在始与上帝斗，午夜帝胜他归乡。

sentences.english: Man always can't submit to the fate, and always wants to struggle with it.
sentences.chinese: 人总是不能服气于命运，总想与它斗一斗。

sentences.english: Full hydraulic steering system is generally used on loaders of small capacities while its application on medium sized units is introduced in this article.

sentences.english: The old peasant was puffing at his pipe.

sentences.english: I usually elect to play mind games with any suspected fish before beginning a new drift.
sentences.chinese: 我通常选择于开始一次新飘流前跟可疑的鱼儿斗斗智。

sentences.english: As long as I breathe, I will fight them.
sentences.chinese: 只要一息尚存，我就要跟他们斗。

sentences.english: This small coat was patched up with pieces of cloth of different colours.
